close_microwave_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the opened door to remove any dirt or food particles.

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it on its hinge to the open position.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door to ensure that no dirt or food particles remain stuck.

close_microwave_door.description: The microwave door is currently in closed position.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to set the time or choose a programme.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it functions properly.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the body of the microwave to remove smudges or dirt.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the microwave body, door, and knob.
